thread.title: Chelsea FC news: Diego Costa actually apologises to team-mate for stunning goal in training | Metro News
thread.title_full: Chelsea FC news: Diego Costa actually apologises to team-mate for stunning goal in training | Metro News

author: Louis Sealey For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Chelsea FC news: Diego Costa actually apologises to team-mate for stunning goal in training | Metro News

organizations.name: metro news louis sealey for metro.co.uk

text:
Louis Sealey for Metro.co.uk Friday 10 Feb 2017 10:06 am Diego Costa beat Chelsea stopper Eduardo with a superb free-kick (Picture: Getty) 
Diego Costa has been scoring goals for fun this season as Chelsea have stormed nine points clear at the top of the Premier League. 
The Spanish star already has 18 goals to his name and is one strike behind the league’s top scorer, Everton’s Romelu Lukaku. Griezmann will accept £85m Manchester United move - but on one key condition 
And it’s not difficult to see why Costa is enjoying a sublime run under Antonio Conte, given this stunning effort in Chelsea training. 
As Chelsea practiced their free-kick drills, Costa uploaded a video on Instagram of a simply unstoppable strike that left third-choice goalkeeper Eduardo helpless. Watch the goal below… A video posted by Diego Costa (@diego.costa) on Feb 9, 2017 at 12:08pm PST
